item.description:
Pull out your finest Sunday summer clothes and fancy sunhats for a Greenwich Polo Match. You picnic right along side of the field sipping wine and nibbling cheese as the horses and riders thunder by. $40 a carload. Gates open at 1:00 for picnicking, games start at 3:00. Dress code: Garden Chic.....after all this is Greenwich! http://www.greenwichp.... It is forecasted to be 86ยบ and sunny. Not sure on the amount of shade there so giant . We need to set up car pooling and lets everyone bring a appetizer and wine to share. We can make this a very chic affair adding our individual touch :-)

Please Call Denise to coordinate 805 714 3733

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Polo in Greenwich"
